Class ChromosomeSegmentData

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.calvin.data.ProbeSetMultiDataBase
      affymetrix.calvin.data.ChromosomeSegmentData

public class ChromosomeSegmentData
extends ProbeSetMultiDataBase

This provides types to store results for a segment.
